title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Researchers make ‘quantum cat’ video out of individual atoms
items.description: Demo showcases new AI-powered tool of potential use in quantum computers

items.title: The U.S. wants to phase out animal research. Are the alternatives ready?
items.description: Drug and chemical safety can be assessed with AI and organ chips, but some scientists say it’s too soon to forgo animal methods entirely

items.title: Corrected study rekindles debate over Microsoft’s quantum computing research
items.description: Dispute over elusive Majorana particles claimed in Science highlights controversial approach to robust quantum chips

items.title: By sucking up DNA, clot-producing platelets could help diagnose cancer
items.description: The cells could be a new source of tumor DNA for liquid biopsies

items.title: Museum artifacts rewrite the timeline of gold refining
items.description: One technique was practiced significantly earlier than some researchers believe

items.title: Brain device that reads inner thoughts aloud inspires strategies to protect mental privacy
items.description: Researchers isolated signals from a brain implant so people with movement disorders could voice thoughts without trying to speak

items.title: A single lock of hair could rewrite what we know about Inca record-keeping
items.description: Evidence from a 500-year-old khipu suggests commoners helped craft the Inca’s intricate knotted records

items.title: New twist on PET scans unlocks hidden signals for diagnosing disease
items.description: Overlooked emissions from exotic positronium atoms could improve medical scanners

items.title: Fossil teeth reveal a previously unknown human ancestor from eastern Africa
items.description: Scientists say the teeth belonged to a type of Australopithecus, a relative of Lucy’s species, that coexisted with our genus, Homo

items.title: Judge tells NSF to reinstate suspended UCLA grants
items.description: Ruling comes as government seeks settlement with UCLA on larger set of suspended grants
